name: MTLVertexAttribute
desc: An object that represents an attribute of a vertex function.

items.name: var attributeIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the attribute, as declared in Metal shader source code.

items.name: var attributeType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type for the attribute, as declared in Metal shader source code.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this vertex attribute is active.

items.name: var isPatchControlPointData: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this vertex attribute represents control point data.

items.name: var isPatchData: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this vertex attribute represents patch data.
